name: SleepLight
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep light
Developer Terms of Use
des:
To try this skill, click the 'Enable’ button in the Alexa App or say 'Alexa enable Sleep Light'. Then say 'Alexa open Sleep Light' to turn on the light.

Sleep Light opens Alexa's blue light for 5 minutes. On Echo Dots, the light will pulse, on Echo Show displays a blue background will show.

ECHO SHOW NOTES:
1) Say "Alexa... stop" to close the blue light with a 20 second delay.
2) Say "Alexa... go home" to immediately turn off the blue light.

Visit https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=201601790 to understand the meaning of Echo light ring patterns.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
